normalised: EdTech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to a Brighter Future!

unnormalised: **EdTech Buzz: Scholarship Portals - Your Ticket to a Brighter Future!**
normalised: Struggling to find the right scholarship to fund your I I T dream? Fear not, aspiring engineers and doctors! A new wave of scholarship portals is making it easier than ever for Indian students to discover financial aid.

unnormalised: Struggling to find the right scholarship to fund your IIT dream? Fear not, aspiring engineers and doctors! A new wave of scholarship portals is making it easier than ever for Indian students to discover financial aid.
normalised: These platforms, like "Vidya Dhan" and "Siksha Sahayak", are becoming the "Amazon" of scholarships, listing everything from merit-based awards to those for specific communities, like the Agarwal Samaj scholarship. Forget endless Google searches! Now you can filter by course, location (Delhi to Dindigul!), and even your family income (say, below rupees five lakh per annum).

unnormalised: These platforms, like "Vidya Dhan" and "Siksha Sahayak", are becoming the "Amazon" of scholarships, listing everything from merit-based awards to those for specific communities, like the Agarwal Samaj scholarship. Forget endless Google searches! Now you can filter by course, location (Delhi to Dindigul!), and even your family income (say, below Rs. 5 lakhs per annum).
normalised: Many portals also offer free counselling sessions – think of it as your friendly neighbourhood Sharmaji guiding you towards that elusive scholarship.

unnormalised: Many portals also offer free counselling sessions – think of it as your friendly neighbourhood Sharmaji guiding you towards that elusive scholarship.
normalised: Applications are now open for several programs with deadlines approaching fast – some as early as twenty seventh october two thousand and twenty three. Don’t miss the boat!

unnormalised: Applications are now open for several programs with deadlines approaching fast – some as early as 27/10/2023. Don’t miss the boat!
normalised: Pro-tip: Create a profile today! Some portals even notify you of scholarships matching your criteria in real-time, say, every day at seventeen hundred hours. A bit of effort now could save you a mountain of student loan debt later. Start your search by ten hundred hours tomorrow, twenty fifth october two thousand and twenty three! Your future self will thank you.

unnormalised: Pro-tip: Create a profile today! Some portals even notify you of scholarships matching your criteria in real-time, say, every day at 17:00 hrs. A bit of effort now could save you a mountain of student loan debt later. Start your search by 10:00 hrs tomorrow, 25/10/2023! Your future self will thank you.
